# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  sqrt.cir sqrt.cir.prn.gs.pl sqrt.cir.sh tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/sqrt.cir.prn.gs.pl PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/sqrt.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}ABM_SQRT/sqrt.cir.sh COMMAND bash sqrt.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} sqrt.cir ${OutputDataDir}/ABM_SQRT/sqrt.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}ABM_SQRT/sqrt.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind;bsrc;expression;transient;vpwl;resistor")
endif()
